name: Dreams of Solari - Chapter 1
detailed_description:
Game Updates


About the Game

In a Dark and twisted future, man will have one city left on earth, New London. The word elite live on the floating palace known as the Oligarkum where they subjugate the masses below. The people of New London live a hellish life. Their ragged world is full of crime, drugs, and mysterious cults. It is a dangerous and cruel world, where the only purpose of those bellow is to serve those above.

Welcome to “Dreams of Solari A Cyberpunk Themed 2d choose your own adventure Story RPG of high tech weapons, vicious gangs and twisted abominations. You are a low level merc who is trying to stay alive in the most dangerous part of New London the Lower City. You find yourself hunted by the government and in over your head in debt to many gang's and factions after a job goes bad. Now your only chance is one last Job to earn all the Creds you need to escape the death trap of the lower city ......or die trying ......

short_description: Welcome to “Dreams of Solari A Cyberpunk Themed 2D choose your own adventure story RPG of high tech weapons, vicious gangs, corporate factions and twisted abominations. Make your mark as a merc of the lower city or be crushed to dust by the meat grinder that is New London the last city on earth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: •Windows XP, Vista 7 or 10
  • Processor: Pentium CPU Running At 2.8GHz or Higher.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: •Dedicated, Accelerated 3D-Graphics Card and Drivers: or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: •Windows XP, Vista 7 or 10
  • Processor: Pentium CPU Running At 2.8GHz or Higher.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: •Dedicated, Accelerated 3D-Graphics Card and Drivers: or better
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Warning this product contains graphic descriptions of extreme violence and mature language
